articles.title: Solar Eclipse 2024: What are ISO-certified eclipse glasses? - Mint
articles.description: A total solar eclipse on April 8 will create a path of totality where the moon covers the sun, darkening the sky. Eclipse glasses meeting ISO 12312-2 standard are essential for safe viewing to protect eyes from harmful solar rays.

articles.title: The universe's accelerated expansion might be slowing down - Phys.org
articles.description: The universe is still expanding at an accelerating rate, but it may have slowed down recently compared to a few billion years ago, early results from the most precise measurement of its evolution yet suggested Thursday.
